solution_line_template: Paul caught {fish_per_interval} fish {total_fishing_hours} / {hours_per_interval} = {number_of_intervals} times that day.
So he was able to catch in total {number_of_intervals} * {fish_per_interval} = <<{number_of_intervals}*{fish_per_interval}={total_fish_caught}>>{total_fish_caught} fish.
